name: When It Hits the Fan
description: When It Hits the Fan is a 2d action arcade top-down shooter for PC and arcade involving four apocalyptic events at once: zombie outbreak, robot AI takeover, demon incursion, and alien invasion!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel or AMD at 2.5 GHz+ Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Anything that supports OpenGL 2.0+ Storage: 75 MB available space Sound Card: OpenAL Compatible Sound Card Additional Notes: Game may slow down severely when recording with 3rd party software.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel or AMD at 2.5 GHz+ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Anything that supports OpenGL 2.0+ Storage: 75 MB available space Sound Card: OpenAL Compatible Sound Card Additional Notes: Game may slow down severely when recording with 3rd party software.
